text: Ani jaba (musa alaihis'salama) uniharuko samu hamro tarphabata satya dharma li'era a'e taba uniharule bhaneh ki yasako sathama imanavalaharu jati chan, uniharuka choraharula'i marihala ra uniharuka choriharula'i jivita chadide'u. Ra inkara garneharuko sadayantra ta vicalita hunala'i matra huncha
